publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5722.1 John Wilson: First ScotRail Industrial Relationsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5722) in the name of Elaine Smith, leave out from first "supports" to end and insert "while accepting the concerns of the Scottish Trades Union Congress (STUC) regarding the discretionary powers to reimburse private companies for revenues lost due to industrial action, considers that the STUC and the Trade Unions involved in disputes with employers should recognise that the discretionary powers were put in place by the previous administrations when awarding contracts to private companies, such as the First ScotRail franchise." Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Anne McLaughlin*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-5722.1 First ScotRail Industrial Relations (lodged on 16 February 2010) Gil Paterson*
